Verile is a 4-year-old hispanic female diagnosed with acute lymphoblastic leukemia. Childhood acute lymphoblastic leukemia (also called ALL or acute lymphocytic leukemia) is a cancer of the blood and bone marrow. This type of cancer usually gets worse quickly if it is not treated.She has heart problems.
She has heart problems. She has had problems in school.
